thread.section_title: Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: THE POOL AREA IS BREATH OF FRESH AIR!!
thread.title_full: THE POOL AREA IS BREATH OF FRESH AIR!! - Review of Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe, Entebbe, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: twinomug
title: THE POOL AREA IS BREATH OF FRESH AIR!!
text:
I was there during the christmas holidays and i was impressed by the service of the staff at the hotel. The food was immpressive a the servings would pass off for a fine dining experience.
The highlight of the stay was the pool area!! With the view of lake victoria, it creates a great peaceful area to appreciate the nature of uganda .
I would recommend it to my friends for a stay.
